wikipedia_page.main: Major General Thomas Needham Furnival Wilson CB DSO MC (20 March 1896 − 15 May 1961) was a British Army officer who saw service in both World War I and World War II.

response: *Major-General (temporary) Thomas Needham Furnival Wilson, DSO, MC, late Infantry.
